ruling: - If [[Ultimate Insect LV7]] is Summoned by the effect of [[Ultimate Insect LV5]], but is then flipped face-down and then face-up again, its effect is reset and will no longer be applied.
- If you have 2 copies of [[Ultimate Insect LV7]] each Summoned by the effect of [[Ultimate Insect LV5]], then the ATK and DEF of your opponent's monsters are reduced by 1400 points.
- *All of your opponent's monsters* means the monsters on your opponent's side of the field.
